API_KEY.description: API_KEY from P-Link.io [optional, you can get API_KEY using the MCP tools]

capabilities.name: get_wallet_and_otp
capabilities.description: Create a wallet for your email or get otp by email

capabilities.name: login_with_otp
capabilities.description: Login using otp. Connect to your P-Link wallet using the one time password you received by email

capabilities.name: fund_my_wallet
capabilities.description: Fund wallet : Obtain a link in order to fund your wallet of the desired amount using a credit card, or the Solana address of your wallet if you want to fund your account using Solana.

capabilities.name: get_private_key_of_wallet
capabilities.description: Get the private key of your wallet on secured app https://p-link.io

capabilities.name: send_money
capabilities.description: Send money to an email, Solana wallet or phone number. The provided email or phone can be used to claim the money of the wallet. If new user does not claim for 3 days, the money is returned to the sender.

capabilities.name: request_payment_link
capabilities.description: Create a payment link in order to request a payment to your account. This payment link can be used to pay you. Payment can be made using a credit card, or any Solana token (automatically converted to USDC)

capabilities.name: get_wallet_info
capabilities.description: Retrieve the wallet infos about the connected P-Link account (Solana wallet address, wallet balance, tokens detail)

capabilities.name: get_transaction_state
capabilities.description: Retrieve the state and details of a transaction using Solana trx ID

capabilities.name: get_wallet_history
capabilities.description: Transaction history : Retrieve list of the transactions related to the specified Solana wallet address (received and sent funds with dates)

capabilities.name: pay_and_get_402_protected_url
capabilities.description: Pay a HTTP 402 protected URL using your P-Link managed account, and returns the result
